name: Cliff Shooter Demo
description:
Controls

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space-bar to shoot
  • Shift key to boost ship

Summary

A proof of concept shoot em' up game I developed during my spare time. The game features 3 waves and 1 boss level. If you're interested in learning more about how I built the game, please take a look at the github source code along with my medium link where I explain my process of building the game out from start to finish.

Github Source

  • https://github.com/hlimbo/Space-Shooter-Tutorial

My Medium Link

  • https://limboh27.medium.com/

Credits

  • Background Music & Art https://ansimuz.itch.io/spaceship-shooter-environment
  • Art https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/space-shooter-enemy-pack-3...
  • Custom Boss Art made by Trey
